title: Kibathi Gaturu is Still in America - The After Show
itunes:title: Kibathi Gaturu is Still in America - The After Show
description:
This week on The After Show, we get some more background on Kibathi coming to America. What is he doing now and what inspired his podcast African Diaspora Connects?

The Cigar Authority is a member of the United Podcast Network and is recorded live in front of a studio audience at Studio 21 Podcast Cafe upstairs at Two Guys Smoke Shop in Salem, NH and as always you can find many of the cigars we discuss at https://www.2GuysCigars.com/.
